div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1668 Egypt, 1912 Burial: c. 310 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 20 AR. A single hoard? Alexander III: 20 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 5, unc. Maced. 1, Lampsacus 2, Side 1, Amathus 1, Citium 3, Sidon 1, Aradus 2, Byblus 1, Ace to 316 B.C. 1, Babylon 1, Alexan- dreia 1) Disposition: New York 5 Note by E. T. Newell in ANS
